title: Yasuo just entered Mortal Kombat X

embed.description: Ahead of the game's release next month, more Mortal Kombat X characters have been revealed by way of a leak. Screenshots posted on Xbox360Achievements (via TestYourMight) suggest that gunslinger Erron Black, previously rumored for the game, is indeed a playable character in the fighting title.

body: Lol High Noon Yasuo = Erron Black
